Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Kup : :
Kup came to the entrence to the Maximal base, opening the main doors.

Kup: Hello AzureBlade. I am Kup. Welcome to the Maximal base. Please come in.

Kup motions for the ice dragon bot to enter the base.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:The ice dragon flew over wide forests and finally landed where Kup had
told him.

It was a wreck. More precisely, a downed Maximal ship that had
crash-landed here, at the fringe of a forest.

He decided to transform. He kept his two plasma blades sheathed and
opened his comm.

AzureBlade: Master Kup, this is AzureBlade. I have arrived at your base.
